items.title: Broader indices snap 2-week gains; 15 small caps record double digit fall
items.description: On the sectoral front, Nifty Realty index shed more than 4 percent, Nifty Defence index fell 4 percent, Nifty PSU Bank index shed 3.5 percent, Nifty Oil & Gas index slipped 3 percent. On the other hand, Nifty FMCG index added 0.7 percent.
